mapper.select:
SELECT data_source_id, data_source, index_identifier, index_type_identifier, index_type_context, index_type_name, resource_title_name, resource_creator_name, resource_subject_text, resource_publisher_name, resource_date, resource_identifier, index_type_scale_text, index_score_numeric, index_qualifier_code, index_comment, index_calculated_date
FROM BIO_HAB_METRIC
ORDER BY data_source_id
